import React from 'react'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link} from 'react-router-dom'; function Total_price(total , item) { return total + (item.price*item.quantity) } export default function PreviewOrder() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) return (

Preview Order

Shipping Name:  {state.cart.shipping.fullname} Adress:  {state.cart.shipping.adress} Edit Payment Method:  {state.cart.paymentMethod} Edit items { state.cart.cartitems.map((x)=>{ return    {x.name}

{x.quantity}

{ x.quantity * x.price}dh

 }) } Edit Order Summary

Items

{state.cart.cartitems.reduce(Total_price,0)}

 ) }
